metadata.title: CVE-2022-29901 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Intel microprocessor generations 6 to 8 are affected by a new Spectrevariant that is able to bypass their retpoline mitigation in the kernel toleak arbitrary data. An attacker with unprivileged user access can hijackreturn instructions to achieve arbitrary speculative code execution undercertain microarchitecture-dependent conditions.

criterions.comment: linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
